definition.name: NXunit_cell
definition.doc:
Base class to describe structural aspects of an arrangement of atoms or ions including a crystallographic unit cell.
Following recommendations of `CIF <https://www.iucr.org/resources/cif/spec/version1.1>`_ and `International Tables of Crystallography <https://it.iucr.org/>`_.

field.name: reference_frame
field.doc: Path to a reference frame in which the unit cell is defined to resolve ambiguity in cases when e.g. a different reference frame than the NeXus default reference frame (McStas) was chosen.

field.name: a_b_c
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified via parameters a, b, and c.

field.name: a
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified individually via parameter a.

field.name: b
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified individually via parameter b.

field.name: c
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified individually via parameter c.

field.name: alpha_beta_gamma
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified via parameters alpha, beta, and gamma.

field.name: alpha
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified individually via parameter alpha.

field.name: beta
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified individually via parameter beta.

field.name: gamma
field.doc: Geometry of the unit cell quantified individually via parameter gamma.

field.name: crystal_system
field.doc:
Crystal system.
For a crystal system in 2D space monoclinic is an exact synonym for oblique. For a crystal system in 2D space orthorhombic is an exact synonym for rectangular. For a crystal system in 2D space tetragonal is an exact synonym for square.

field.name: laue_group
field.doc: Laue group using International Table of Crystallography notation.

field.name: point_group
field.doc: Point group using International Table of Crystallography notation.

field.name: space_group
field.doc: Space group from the International Table of Crystallography notation.

field.name: is_centrosymmetric
field.doc:
True if space group is considered a centrosymmetric one. False if space group is considered a non-centrosymmetric one.
Centrosymmetric has all types and combinations of symmetry elements (translation, rotational axis, mirror planes, center of inversion) Non-centrosymmetric compared to centrosymmetric is constrained (no inversion). Chiral compared to non-centrosymmetric is constrained (no mirror planes).

field.name: is_chiral
field.doc: True if space group is considered a chiral one. False if space group is consider a non-chiral one.

field.name: area
field.doc: Area of the unit cell if dimensionality is 2.

field.name: volume
field.doc: Volume of the unit cell if dimensionality is 3.
